import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const NavBar = () => { const username = useSelector(state => state.user.username) const is_login = useSelector(state => state.user.is_login) return (

); } export default NavBar;
